General.Name: Rana Sugars Limited
General.Description: Rana Sugars Limited engages in the manufacture of sugar, ethanol, and co-generation of power in India. It operates through three segments: Sugar Manufacturing, Ethanol/ENA Manufacturing, and Power Generation. The company offers sugar, molasses, and bagasse, as well as double refined white sulphurless sugar, plantation white sugar, raw sugar, and sugar from sugar beet. It also provides ethanol, liquor, and various grades of alcohol, such as rectified spirit and potable grade extra neutral alcohol. In addition, the company generates the power from bagasse and by-products of sugar. Further, it offers sugar beet pulp as cattle feed. Rana Sugars Limited was incorporated in 1991 and is based in Chandigarh, India.
